### <a name="does-the-location-of-your-customer-data-have-a-direct-impact-on-your-end-users-experience"></a><span data-ttu-id="efd2a-123">客戶資料的位置是否會直接影響使用者的使用體驗？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-123">Does the location of your customer data have a direct impact on your end users' experience?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-124">Microsoft 365 的效能並不只是與使用者距離資料中心位置成比例。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-124">The performance of Microsoft 365 is not simply proportional to a user's distance to data center locations.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-125">Microsoft 在其全球雲端網路、全球雲端基礎結構和 Microsoft 365 服務架構中的持續投資，可協助為使用者提供單一且一致的體驗，而不受待用客戶資料儲存的位置限制。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-125">Microsoft's continued investments in its global cloud network, global cloud infrastructure, and the Microsoft 365 services architecture help provide users with a singular, consistent experience independent of where customer data is stored at rest.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-126">如果您的使用者遇到效能問題，您應深入疑難排解這些問題。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-126">If your users are experiencing performance issues, you should troubleshoot those in depth.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-127">Microsoft 已在 [Office 支援網站](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862645)上發佈指導方針，供 Microsoft 365 客戶規劃並最佳化使用者效能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-127">Microsoft has published guidance for Microsoft 365 customers to plan for and optimize end-user performance on the [Office Support web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862645).</span></span>

### <a name="how-does-microsoft-help-me-comply-with-my-national-regional-and-industry-specific-regulations"></a><span data-ttu-id="efd2a-128">Microsoft 如何協助我遵守國家、地區和產業特定法規？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-128">How does Microsoft help me comply with my national, regional, and industry-specific regulations?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-129">為了協助您遵守管理個人資料收集和使用的國家、地區和產業特定需求，Microsoft 365 提供適用於任何全球雲端生產力服務提供者的最全面合規性服務集合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-129">To help you comply with national, regional, and industry-specific requirements governing the collection and use of individuals' data, Microsoft 365 offers the most comprehensive set of compliance offerings of any global cloud productivity provider.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-130">請檢閱[我們的合規性服務](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864391)和 Microsoft 信任中心上的 [Microsoft 365 合規性](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862317)一節中的更多詳細資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-130">Please review [our compliance offerings](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864391) and more details in the [Microsoft 365 Compliance](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=862317) section on the Microsoft Trust Center.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-131">此外，某些 Microsoft 365 方案可提供更進一步的合規性解決方案，協助您管理資料、遵守法律和法規需求，並監控對資料所採取的動作。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-131">Also, certain Microsoft 365 plans offer further compliance solutions to help you manage your data, comply with legal and regulatory requirements, and monitor actions taken on your data.</span></span>

### <a name="who-can-access-your-data-and-according-to-what-rules"></a><span data-ttu-id="efd2a-132">誰可以存取您的資料，以及根據什麼規則？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-132">Who can access your data and according to what rules?</span></span>

 <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-133">Microsoft 實作強大的 措施來協助保護您的客戶資料不受不當存取或由未經授權的人員使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-133">Microsoft implements strong measures to help protect your customer data from inappropriate access or use by unauthorized persons.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-134">這包括限制 Microsoft 人員和轉包商的存取，並謹慎定義用於回應客戶資料控管要求的需求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-134">This includes restricting access by Microsoft personnel and subcontractors, and carefully defining requirements for responding to government requests for customer data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-135">不過，您可以隨時並基於任何原因存取自己的客戶資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-135">However, you can access your own customer data at any time and for any reason.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-136">[Microsoft 信任中心](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864392)上提供更多詳細資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-136">More details are available on the [Microsoft Trust Center](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864392).</span></span>

### <a name="does-microsoft-access-your-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="efd2a-137">Microsoft 是否會存取您的資料？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-137">Does Microsoft access your data?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-138">Microsoft 會將多數的 Microsoft 365 作業自動化，同時特意限制其本身對客戶資料的存取。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-138">Microsoft automates most Microsoft 365 operations while intentionally limiting its own access to customer data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-139">這可協助我們以大規模管理 Microsoft 365，並解決對客戶資料造成內部威脅的風險。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-139">This helps us manage Microsoft 365 at scale and address the risks of internal threats to customer data.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-140">根據預設，Microsoft 工程師具有零常設系統管理權限，且對 Microsoft 365 中的客戶資料具有零常設存取權。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-140">By default, Microsoft engineers have no standing administrative privileges and no standing access to customer data in Microsoft 365.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-141">Microsoft 工程師可能會對客戶資料具有有限和登入的存取權且達有限的一段時間，但只有在一般服務作業必要的情況，且僅限由 Microsoft 資深管理成員的核准下 (且針對獲客戶授權使用客戶加密箱功能的客戶)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-141">A Microsoft engineer may have limited and logged access to customer data for a limited amount of time, but only when necessary for normal service operations and only when approved by a member of senior management at Microsoft (and, for customers who are licensed for the Customer Lockbox feature, by the customer).</span></span>

### <a name="how-does-microsoft-secure-your-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="efd2a-142">Microsoft 如何保護您的資料？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-142">How does Microsoft secure your data?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-143">Microsoft 的 Microsoft 365 內建了穩健的原則、控制和系統，可協助確保資訊安全。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-143">Microsoft has robust policies, controls, and systems built into Microsoft 365 to help keep your information safe.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-144">若要深入了解，請檢閱 Microsoft 信任中心上的 [Microsoft 365 安全性區段](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864393)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-144">Review the [Microsoft 365 security section](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?linkid=864393) on the Microsoft Trust Center to learn more.</span></span>

### <a name="does-microsoft-365-encrypt-your-data"></a><span data-ttu-id="efd2a-145">Microsoft 365 是否加密您的資料？</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-145">Does Microsoft 365 encrypt your data?</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-146">Microsoft 365 使用服務端技術，可加密待用客戶資料和傳輸中的客戶資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-146">Microsoft 365 uses service-side technologies that encrypt customer data at rest and in transit.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-147">針對待用客戶資料，Microsoft 365 使用了磁碟區層級和檔案層級加密。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-147">For customer data at rest, Microsoft 365 uses volume-level and file-level encryption.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-148">針對傳輸中的客戶資料，Microsoft 365 針對資料中心之間和用戶端與伺服器之間的通訊使用多種加密技術，例如傳輸層安全性 (TLS) 和網際網路通訊協定安全性 (IPsec)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-148">For customer data in transit, Microsoft 365 uses multiple encryption technologies for communications between data centers and between clients and servers, such as Transport Layer Security (TLS) and Internet Protocol Security (IPsec).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-149">Microsoft 365 也包含客戶管理的加密功能。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-149">Microsoft 365 also includes customer-managed encryption features.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-158">Microsoft 不會將 Intune 客戶待用資料儲存在所述的地理位置之外。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-158">Microsoft will not store Intune customer data at rest outside the stated Geo.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-159">以下情況除外：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-159">except if:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-160">Microsoft 必須提供客戶支援、疑難排解服務或符合法律需求。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-160">It is necessary for Microsoft to provide customer support, troubleshoot the service, or comply with legal requirements.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-161">客戶設定帳戶以啟用這類客戶資料的儲存，包括透過使用下列項目：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-161">The customer configures an account to enable such storage of customer data, including through the use of the following:</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-162">專為全球運作而設計的功能，例如內容傳遞網路 (CDN)，其提供全球快取服務並將客戶資料儲存在世界各地的端點位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-162">Features that are designed to operate globally, such as Content Delivery Network (CDN), which provides a global caching service and stores customer data at edge locations around the world.</span></span>

  - <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-163">Azure Active Directory (Azure AD)，可全球儲存目錄資料。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-163">Azure Active Directory (Azure AD), which may store directory data globally.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-164">這不適用於美國 (其中的 Azure AD 資料完全儲存於美國) 或歐洲 (其中的 Azure AD 資料儲存於歐洲或美國) 的 Azure AD 部署。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-164">This does not apply to Azure AD deployments in the United States (where Azure AD data is stored solely in the United States) or in Europe (where Azure AD data is stored in Europe or the United States).</span></span>
   
  - <span data-ttu-id="efd2a-165">預覽版、Beta 版或其他搶鮮版服務，其一般會將客戶資料儲存在美國，但也可能會將其儲存在全球。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-165">Preview, beta, or other prerelease services, which typically store customer data in the United States but may store it globally.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="efd2a-166">儘管如此，Microsoft 不會控制或限制客戶或其使用者可能從中存取客戶資料的地理位置。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="efd2a-166">Regardless, Microsoft does not control or limit the Geo from which customers or their end users may access customer data.</span></span>
